dc_title_s: United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) Agricultural Marketing Service
dc_description_s: Farmers‘market points are taken from USDA‘s Agricultural Marketing Service (AMS) through the Farmers‘Market Directory. The Directory is a reporting system where local farmers‘market managers list the locations of their markets and basic details. The data may not include all farmers‘markets. AMS reports geographic coordinates as reported through the Directory. PolicyMap geocoded market addresses whose geographic coordinates fell outside the reported county, and was able to display 99% of the provided locations on a map.The Farmers‘Market Directory is updated on a rolling basis. AMS data will be updated on PolicyMap annually.
